The larger bedroom also featured a small table useful only for small meals. The bathroom was off the short hallway between the rooms. It featured a large mirror over the vanity and a jacuzzi. We did not experience any of the issues with noise or problems with the hotel staff like some of the other reviewers complained about. The staff was generally responsive to our needs. Parking was not the best, however. The hotel has some parking under and around it. There is also a remote lot a little over a block away. Fortunately, the hotel's great location allows you to not have to drive too much. There were usually no open spots around the hotel itself except in the late morning hours around check out time. I had to park one time in the remote lot before moving to an open hotel spot in the late morning, and I noticed that the remote lot was full when I moved my car. I can see how some people might have problems finding an open space if they drive a lot. Generally, my slightly above-average rating is due to the great location at 5th street and the boardwalk and to its king-sized beds. Otherwise, it is no more than an average hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - great stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Traveller23
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the 2 room suite and it was great - clean, bright, spacious - almost perfect. Only thing that would have made the suite 100% perfect is if there was a door separating the two bedrooms. The kitchen area which was between the 2 bedrooms was small but we did not use it anyway. The Bluefin bar/restaurant that they advertise so much was a joke - half the time they were out of half the things we ordered which was a little annoying but no big deal. After having read many bad reviews of this hotel we were a little concerned but were very happy with our stay and would stay there again. Also, the location was perfect on the boardwalk where all the action is.

Reviews.Title: “Great oceanfront hotel”
Reviews.Author: firstmom
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical to stay here after reading all the mixed reviews, but I am glad that I did. We had a 2 room OV suite and it was perfect. It was very roomy and clean. The maid service was excellent. We had no management problems. Everything we asked for was given to us in a timely manner. The only suggestion I have to people is to request a room away from the pool bar because it can get quite noisy. But, other than that, we had a great stay and definately will return.

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had an ocean front room that overlooked the Boardwalk. You are in the middle of the action here and only a few steps to the beach. You only hear the ocean. No traffic noise which was very loud in other areas. The ocean front rooms are not very spacious the partial ocean view rooms were very large. We would not have traded the ocean front for partial. We enjoyed sitting out watching the ocean and the people on the boardwalk just below. The pool on the 2nd floor at the tideland suites with a bar and grill was beautiful. That is the newer part of the hotel you walk through the parking lot to the other lobby to get to it. Our room was nice and clean, could have used a paint job. It looks like it could use some upgrading. The cleaning staff was wonderful. I asked our cleaning lady for blankets and extra sheets to put on top of them and she did it for us for our whole stay. Our room was always cleaned by 10:30 in the morning. I loved the location. I hope maybe by next year they invest some money to fix up their rooms a little.

Reviews.Title: “Bad rap...”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Was concerned after reading all the bad reviews on this hotel and didn't know what to expect, but have just returned from a 3 night stay over the 4th of July. We reserved one of the suites - it was large, comfortable and clean. 2 King Beds and a sleeper sofa and plenty of room to move around. The small refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster and 2 burner stove were nice additions. Great location if you want to be close to the boardwalk. 2nd floor pool and pool bar/restaurant nice and convenient, also roof top pool. Parking is at a premium - so get a space and don't move your car! Was a pleasant weekend, would recommend this hotel and would go back in the future.

HotelInfo.Name: Tidelands Caribbean Hotel and Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 409 Atlantic Avenue, 5th Street on the Boardwalk, Ocean City, MD 21842
